title: @High elo: What do I do in this situation?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/zkXfMlZ.jpg

I drew out a basic diagram. I'm the ADC on red side here, the minion wave is shoved up *almost* to our turret, but not quite. Their support is in the (possibly unwarded) bush, such that if I try to cs, I'm vulnerable to poke from both the enemy bot laners. I usually just wait until they shove the wave into tower, but this almost always results in missing a ton of cs, since the minions are usually at pretty awkward health values after battling my own minions. The problem is, the wave doesn't reset after that, it just gets locked up in the same position again the next wave, so it's a perpetual loop of being zoned out of cs without ever being able to push back.

Halp.
